work.title: PDIS (Public Digital Innovation Space)
work.location: Executive Yuan 行政院, Taipei, Taiwan
p: PDIS is a goveronment origanization in Taiwan, it also has another name: Executive Yuan - Ministry of Digital - Audrey Tang's 唐鳳 Office. We use new technology to improve public participation and open government. We want to increase citizen participation, so we set up a video streaming during meeting. Citizen can join meeting and share their experiment anywhrere. They only need to submit a question to sli.do(a real-time comment system).

I am a member of Code Team and Video team I developed many tools, like PDIS Line Bot, A tool to synchronize Google and Outlook data. I also maintain our server, Sandstorm, Rocket.Chat and other services. In this year, I also serve for Alternative Military Service. I learned a lot skills and how to collaborate with different people.

work.title: 91app (Nexdoor)
p:
Nexdoor is a famous App company in 2013, we build iOS/Android/Web for customer. In 2014, most of employee join new company 91 app.
          I was a iOS Engineer Intern when I was an undergraduate student in 2013.
